message: I'm excited to offer you a unique opportunity to acquire a valuable asset. I believe this product will be a great fit for you, and I'm willing to start with a competitive price. I'm offering the product to you for $1200000.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900000. I believe this is a fair price considering the market value of the product.

I understand you're looking to negotiate, and I'm willing to meet you in the middle. However, I need to ensure I get a fair price for this product. I'm willing to consider a price of $1050000. This is a compromise that should be beneficial for both of us.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my target budget. I'm willing to go up to $950000, but I think that's the highest I can go. Can you meet me at that price?

I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, and I appreciate your honesty. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $950000. I'm willing to meet you at $1050000, but I'm also considering other options. I'll make you a counteroffer: $980000. This is my final offer, and I'm not willing to go any lower.

I appreciate your final offer, but I'm still not comfortable going above $950000. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our previous offers, which would be $1005000. I think this is a fair compromise, considering the market value of the product.

I'm not willing to compromise further on the price. I believe the product is worth more than $1005000, and I'm not willing to sell it to you for less than $1200000. I'm willing to give you one last chance to meet me at this price. If not, I'll have to explore other options.
